member.name: DESIGNVECTOR
member.summary: The DESIGNVECTOR structure is used by an application to specify values for the axes of a multiple master font.

member.name: DESIGNVECTOR.dvNumAxes
member.summary: Number of values in the dvValues array.

member.name: DESIGNVECTOR.dvValues
member.summary: An array specifying the values of the axes of a multiple master OpenType font. This array corresponds to the axlAxisInfo array in the structure.
